item.title: Labcorp Raises Full Year Guidance After Q2 Earnings Beat Wall Street Expectations: Retail Sees Rally To $330
item.description: A weaker dollar primarily drove the lift in guidance in addition to the strength of the business, the company said.

item.title: Mullen Automotive Name Change To Be Effective July 28, But Retail’s Not Optimistic Yet
item.description: Mullen Automotive will change its name to Bollinger Innovations, Inc.
